code:
%%{CloudNative_DockerImage}}}%%
sequenceDiagram
    participant A as Aggregate
    participant E as Event Store
    participant R as Reactor
    participant Q as Queue
    participant W as Queue Worker
    participant S as Side Effect
    
    A->>E: Store Event
    E->>R: Dispatch Event
    R->>Q: Push Job
    Q->>W: Process Job
    W->>S: Execute Side Effect
    alt Success
        S->>W: Return Success
        W->>Q: Mark Job as Completed
    else Failure
        S->>W: Return Failure
        W->>Q: Retry Job
    end
repo_description: Free and Open Source ERP platform

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Aggregate、Event Store的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: Reactor、Queue主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Reactor、Queue应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 相较于方案A，Reactor、Queue有更好的性能。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Reactor、Queue应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 从结构上看，我们有Queue Worker、Side Effect。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Queue Worker、Side Effect应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，Queue Worker、Side Effect就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 从结构上看，我们有Store Event、Dispatch Event。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Store Event、Dispatch Event的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 这个系统主要由Push Job、Process Job组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Push Job、Process Job是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含Return Success、Mark Job as Completed这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，Return Success、Mark Job as Completed就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理Retry Job？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 好的，那就按这个方案。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Retry Job结束。
